div.q:
AniMerch is a Malaysian company specialising in Japanese toys! Established in the year 2020, AniMerch has a started from a humble four-man team to the successful company it is today.
As of the year 20XX, Animerch has been crowned "Best Imaginary Malaysian-based Webstore" by the famous C.Jke. Other notable achievements include "Best Imaginary Sold Japanese Toys in Malaysia 20XY" by Ng.Ro, "Best Imaginary Young Businesses" by BteA.Na and "Best Imaginary Company" by Won.Ka.
